event.title: GD@IU Wrap Up
event.body: !format (( Come help us help you! We need you now, more than ever, to let us know how we did for the first semester. What did you like and dislike? What peaked your interests, what had you wished covered in more depth? How might we get more people to come to events in the future? After feedback is received, come back next semester to see what's new with GD@IU. ))
